thread.title: Politicians call urgent meeting following Condor chaos
thread.title_full: Politicians call urgent meeting following Condor chaos | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Politicians call urgent meeting following Condor chaos
text:
Kevin Stewart @kevinstewartgsy Follow @ jd5217 @ peoplepowergg @ govgg that is being written now and released shortly. Urgent meeting of gov Jersey and Guernsey on Monday
11:39 - 20 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Guernsey and Jersey's governments are expected to hold an urgent meeting today after three days of chaos for Condor travellers.
Saturday's Liberation was completely cancelled and Sunday's left without more than 100 of its passengers.
The situation has left politicians - and people - angry and frustrated.
Am I going to get back in time? Do I have to stay for a bit longer? Do I have to call work, is it going to be a problem? Next time, should I ask for an extra day or are they going to say 'you wanted three days off last time and it went to four because of the ferries, and we can't allow you four'.
â€“ Peter Vale, UK traveller Play video Last updated Mon 21 Sep 2015 Read more 21 updates Condor Liberation services cancelled after mechanical issues Travel Guernsey Jersey
